notes.text:
Was trying out a GB deck, which got 10 win streak to get me to Legend 3. Because I didn't want to get to KoG really, I've decided to try Jurrac's which I would later try to get KoG on stream.

Well, I got LUCKY and went on a 5 win streak with this  JURRAC deck. Don't expect to win alot with it though, I doubt I could do a full legend climb with it. Well, so late to the season it might be possible.
